decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Location Plan, Revisions 220524 LW202300111 Block Plans, Revisions 220524 LW202300111 Ground and First Fl plans, Revisions 220524 LW202300111 Loft and Roof Fl Plans, Revisions 220524 LW202300111 Elevations, Revisions 220524 LW202300111 Side Elevations, Revisions 220524 LW202300111 Sections, Revisions 220524 LW202300111 Pre Existing Plans, Revisions 220524 LW202300111 Elevations, Revisions 220524 LW202300111 Section AA
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be approved as per application reference number 234390CPL unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Rear roof extension involving increase in roof ridge height of original roof (Retrospective application)
